text: (Muhemmed! tu ji wan ra aha) beje, "Hun bi gotina Yezdan u saiye wi bikin." Heke ewan ji ve gotina te) ru fetilandin, idi tista li ser (sai) hatiye barkirine hey (ragihandini) heye u tista li ser we ji (geli kesan!) ku hun bi wi hatine barkirine (lite kirina biryaren Yezdan) heye. Heke hun bi gotina (sai) bikin, hune werne (reya rast). Li ser saiyan ji pestire ragihandina hizwarti qe tu tist tune ye
